clip.quote: The truth is you need to show up on camera, talking to people and letting them see who you are.
clip.why_clipworthy: It emphasizes the necessity of personal presence in video content for business growth.
clip.suggested_hook: Why showing up on camera is non-negotiable for real estate success.

script:
```json
{
  "script": {
    "HOOK": "(0:00-0:08) Are you hiding behind your listings? Here's why stepping in front of the camera is your game-changer!",
    "SETUP": "(0:08-0:18) Meet Kim Rittberg, who believes that real estate success hinges on one thing: your personal presence on video.",
    "INSIGHT": "(0:18-0:40) 'The truth is you need to show up on camera, talking to people and letting them see who you are,' says Kim. This builds trust and credibility, making you more than just a name on a business card.",
    "REFRAME/APPLICATION": "(0:40-0:52) By showcasing your expertise and relatability, you transform viewers into clients. Embrace the discomfort and watch your business grow.",
    "CTA": "(0:52-0:60) Ready to step up? Start recording today and share your story. What will your first video be about?"
  },
  "caption": "Camera shy? It's time to step up and shine! Discover why video presence is key for real estate success.",
  "hashtags": ["#RealEstateSuccess", "#VideoMarketing", "#TrustBuilding", "#SocialMediaGrowth", "#CameraConfidence"],
  "content_pillar": "real_talk"
}
```
